participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and family-oriented, Ethan enjoys connecting with others and values his relationships.
participant_1.background: I love my family, although I don't always agree with them. I am not married. I have high speed internet. I am the youngest of three brothers. I was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Resilient and independent, Maya embraces challenges and finds joy in her own company.
participant_2.background: I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family. I've been with myself for the longest time, and it's been a bumpy ride. I have two border collies. I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record. I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.

content.text: Hello, what did you do today?
I applied to a bunch of jobs, and went to the park with my dogs.
Oh cool, what kind of dogs do you have?
I have two border collies, they're my best friends.
Oh I've never met a border collie before, what are they like?
They're super smart and energetic, they're always up for a good game of fetch.
That sounds fun, I like dogs that are active.
Yeah they're great dogs, I'm really lucky to have them.
Me too, I love my family, but I'm the youngest of three brothers so they can be a handful sometimes.
Haha I can imagine, but it's good to have siblings to grow up with.
Yeah it is, I'm grateful for them. What about you, are you married?
No, I've been single for a while now.
Oh, that's okay, you're not missing out on much.
Haha yeah, I'm not really looking for anything serious right now.
Me neither, I'm just enjoying being single and having fun.
Yeah, that's the way to be
